name: Raft Life
description:
Dazed and confused you start to wake up - the last thing you can remember is the shipwreck...

You look North, then East, then South, then West - nothing but crystal blue ocean.

You think to yourself - 'If I'm going to get to shore one day, I want to do it in style'

Cut down trees, fish, collect plastic, keep pets, scare those pesky sharks away and get a collection of animal friends along the way.

Good Luck and Enjoy your Raft Life
